oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A non-symplectic automorphism of order 21 of a K3 surface
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jang, Junmyeong
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Algebraic Geometry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, we prove that, over an algebraically closed field whose characteristic is not 2,3 nor 7, a pair of a K3 surface and a purely non-symplectic automorphism of order 21 or 42 is unique up to isomorphism.
Comment: This paper has been withdrawn by the author because it turns out that the main result is not true
